title: Champ select (especially for ranked) Extremely laggy
body:
Hi

For some reason champ select for me is super buggy and laggy and the client in general, not letting me push the queue in button, not letting me lock in champions causing me to "dodge" or ban champions even. 

Its really annoying I haven't got a ban yet but theirs been ranked games where I haven't been able to ban or pick properly because I cant see the enemies champions or something like that

Anyone got a fix would be excellent 

Thanks very much

**GodOfCrabs **

replies.body:
This could either be caused by bad game files, or an unstable connection causing you to lose sync.  Download our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) and try a force repatch in case bad game files are getting in the way.

If that doesn't resolve your issue, hop into custom games for now and go over the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to help troubleshoot this.  I hope that helps!
